title: Bug 2940: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: When updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate the process. Currently, there is no indication of the update process and it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table.
OB: When updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature, there is no indication of the update process and it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table.
EB: When updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate the update process. The update process should also be optimized to reduce the time it takes to update the checked state of the table.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Go to the Export Zip feature. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose the desired file types. 5. Press OK.
